instanceVariables.name: SpawnFrequency
instanceVariables.desc: Interval in seconds in which to spawn soldiers

instanceVariables.name: SpawnBatchSize
instanceVariables.desc: Determine how many soldiers should spawn in a row every SpawnFrequency seconds

instanceVariables.name: SoldierTravelSpeed
instanceVariables.desc: Speed at which soldiers travel after spawning

instanceVariables.name: CurrentTouchID
instanceVariables.desc: Since each player can have one touch at a time, but with multiple players, there can be multiple touches starting and ending at different times, this variable will keep track of touches for each player. Property used in code and is hidden in editor.

instanceVariables.name: SelectedZoneID
instanceVariables.desc: UID of the zone currently picked to transfer soldiers from
